text: is an armored artillery vehicle used by the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force (JGSDF).Jane's Armour and Artillery 2008, Type 75 155 mm self-propelled howitzer (Japan), Self-propelled guns and howitzers (tracked) ; retrieved 2012-2-17. ==Overview== The Type 75s were accepted for service in October 1975. Type 99 155 mm self-propelled howitzer is supplementary to the Type 75s. == Related pages == * Artillery of Japan * List of howitzers ==References== == Other websites == * Military-today.com, Type 75 * GlobalSecurity.org, Type 75 * OnWar.com, Type 75 Category:Japanese weapons Category:Howitzers
title: Type 75 155 mm self-propelled howitzer
